mapper.insert: insert into business_sms_recharge_log (business_sms_id,business_id,sms_type_id,payamount,order_no,alipay_order_no,ispay,status,created_at,updated_at,sms_num,ex_sms_num,sms,gift_num) SELECT a.id,#{id},#{type},#{pay},#{orderNum},"","0","1",NOW(),NOW(),t.sms_num+a.current_sms_num,a.current_sms_num,t.sms_num,t.gift_num from (select id,current_sms_num from business_sms where business_id=#{id}) a , (select sms_num,gift_num from sms_type where id=#{type}) t
mapper.select: select IF(bsrl.order_no = '00000000000000' ,'易订赠送','充值') as access, bsrl.order_no, bsrl.sms+ if(bsrl.gift_num is null,0,bsrl.gift_num) as smscount, bsrl.payamount, bsrl.updated_at, bsrl.invoice_status, sir.id as invoiceRecordId, bsrl.id as id from business_sms_recharge_log bsrl left join sms_invoice_record sir on sir.recharge_log_id=bsrl.id where bsrl.business_id = #{businessId} and bsrl.`status` = 2 order by bsrl.updated_at desc
